title: Laird Barron (ology)
creator: Blue Tyson
description: About the work of horror writer Laird Barron, and is a companion to the Laird Barron (ology) website http://lairdbarron.blogspot.com and collects the content found at the site. The various entries and elements can also be browsed there. Barron as a writer often works in a Lovecraft type tradition, using his own Pacific Northwest and in particular Washington State mythos. Also noir influences. This is also at Smashwords If you prefer a different format. http://lairdbarron.blogspot.com
